title: Meeting agenda creator
goal: Generate structured meeting agendas to improve meeting efficiency
prompt: Create a professional meeting agenda for a {meeting_type} meeting about {topic}. Duration: {duration} minutes. Include: objectives, discussion topics with time allocations, action items template, and next steps.

responses.gpt-4:
MEETING AGENDA

Type: Team Standup
Topic: Q4 Product Launch
Duration: 30 minutes

OBJECTIVES:
1. Align on launch timeline
2. Identify blockers
3. Assign action items...
responses.gemini-pro:
